ComicInfo.Summary: Set up by Barry, the Tick and Arthur investigate Brenda Industries only to find a cabal of deadly villains lying in wait for them, and a battle ensues. Meanwhile, back at the Comet Club, Barry shows up in his old costume and brags that he has taken care of his little Tick problem. With the smell of villainous perfidy in the air, almost every hero in New York heads out to help the Tick. With hundreds of heroes stealing their glory, the Tick and Arthur feel that New York is overpopulated with vigilant protectors and decide to head back to the City.
